official-title.#text:
To exempt employers from any excise tax and certain suits
		  and penalties in the case of a failure of a group health plan to provide
		  coverage to which an employer objects on the basis of religious belief or moral
		  conviction.

header.#text:
No penalties

			 grounds

insofar as such requirement relates to providing coverage to which an employer
